title: Shin-Nichi!
alternative_title: しんにち！ ; New Day! ; Shinnichi!
status: しんにち！ ; New Day! ; Shinnichi!
description:
Description :
        New Japan Pro-wrestling and Moe shares the same ring in this special collaboration! Hiroshi Tanahashi, Shinsuke Nakamura, Kazuchika Okada, and more are unchanged but charged with moe! This results in.... Unpredictable Shenanigans! Super Acute Angle! Becoming an idiot, learning, fighting; all starts in this high school life filled with pro-wrestling love!
